mdRecord.dcterms:title: Operating kit
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: J. H. Gemrig [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Civil War-era operating kit contained in mahogany case. Originally belonged to Dr. T.L. Sutter, a Confederate Army surgeon from Paris, Virginia.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
Donated by Margaret Herrell in honor of Dr. Wallace E. Herrell (UVA SOM 1933) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
